utterances: What's on the menu?
Tell me about your dishes
What do you serve?
answers: At Ntachi Osa Restaurant, we offer a diverse and delicious menu. Here's a glimpse of what we serve: Egusi Soup, Jollof Rice, Banga Stew Rice, Draw Soup, White Rice & Stew, Fried Chicken, Fried Fish, Moi-Moi, Yam & Egg Sauce, Goat Meat, Cow Leg, Fried Plantain, Achicha / Fiofio, Porridge Plantain, Vegetable Soup with Garri and Mix Meat, Ukwa with Fish, Stick Beef, Ora Soup, Moi-Moi with Fish, Fio-Fio with Fish, Beans, Plantain with Fish, White Yam & Egg Sauce, Single Fried or Boiled Fish, Bitter Leaf Soup with 2 Pieces of Meat, Fried Rice with Chicken and Salad.
